Americans fought a war with brother against brother that changed the art of warfare for the entire world. The causes of that war were many but slavery was the prominent one. 
  Many of our forefathers came to America fleeing war and persecution in their former nations. They assimilated, forming a great country; one of which the world had never seen the like.
